Package model

Class DrawingExplorer

java.lang.Object
model.DrawingExplorer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DrawingExplorer extends Object implements Serializable
DrawingExplorer: Manages drawing-related actions and alerts in the application. This class is responsible for managing various drawing-related actions and alerts within the application. It interacts with the primary stage and handles actions such as exporting, importing, saving drawings, and showing alerts.
Version:
1.6
Author:
Doom Al Rajhi, Tanay Desai

  • Method Details

    • exportDrawing

      public void exportDrawing(DrawingCanvas drawingCanvas)
      Export the current drawing from the given drawingCanvas to a file. The exported file format is typically in PNG, which supports images with transparency.
      Parameters:
      drawingCanvas - The drawingCanvas containing the artwork to be exported.

    • importDrawing

      public void importDrawing(DrawingCanvas drawingCanvas)
      Imports a saved drawing from a file and loads it into the provided drawingCanvas.
      Parameters:
      drawingCanvas - The drawingCanvas where the imported drawing will be loaded. The saved drawing should be in a compatible format (e.g., PNG).

    • closingAlert

      public void closingAlert(javafx.stage.WindowEvent event, PaintCanvasGUI paintWindowCanvasGUI)
      Displays a confirmation alert when the user attempts to close the application with unsaved changes.
      Parameters:
      event - The WindowEvent representing the close request.
      paintWindowCanvasGUI - The PaintCanvasGUI instance managing the application.
